name: TripleSix Bot
description: Telegram bot for streaming video on your voice chat

SESSION.description: fill it with pyrogram(p) session string

API_ID.description: fill it with your API ID from my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: fill it with your API HASH from my.telegram.org

BOT_TOKEN.description: fill it with bot token from botfather

GROUP_URL.description: fill it with your group link, ex t.me/sixninesupport

CHANNEL_URL.description: fill it with your channel link, ex t.me/sixnineproject
